pageContext.claim: “Well, we're getting -- we're getting great prices on equipment. We're getting great prices on equipment, and we're helping the states.”
pageContext.analysis: Governors and health care workers on the front lines complained for weeks that the federal government issued contradictory messages on covid-19 and failed to provide enough equipment to meet burgeoning needs as the outbreak began to escalate. Competition among state, federal, and local governments increased dramatically leading prices to spike for many personal protective equipment needs.
